tasks.label: Validate JSON Files
args: Get-ChildItem -Path . -Recurse -Include *.json | ForEach-Object { Write-Host "Validating: $($_.Name)"; try { Get-Content $_.FullName | ConvertFrom-Json > $null; Write-Host "✓ Valid: $($_.Name)" -ForegroundColor Green } catch { Write-Host "✗ Invalid: $($_.Name) - $($_.Exception.Message)" -ForegroundColor Red } }
